explains: adj. 近代的；现代的；当今的

sentences.en: He holds the belief that he is a latter-day prophet.
sentences.cn: 他深信自己是当代先知。

sentences.en: The village had a reputation as a latter-day Sodom and Gomorrah.
sentences.cn: 这个村子曾经被称为现代版的邪恶之城所多玛和蛾摩拉城。

sentences.en: Today’s Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints doesn’t resemble a cult in any meaningful way.
sentences.cn: 今天的后期圣徒教会在任何意义上都不属于一个异端教派。
